Taking Flight
起飞

Created by CraneBlock
由CraneBlock打造



Inspired by the beauty of Minecraft’s quartz,CraneBlock has taken this “basic” block and created some not-so-basic builds. Let your imagination soar by checking out some of the additional images below.
有感于Minecraft的石英之美，CraneBlock 使用了这个“基础”的方块创造出了不那么基础的建筑。看看下面这些图片，让你的想象力如天马般在空中自由飞翔吧。

Have you built something spectacular? Send your screenshots (and any other information we might find helpful) to FeatureMe@minecraft.net and keep an eye on future articles!
你有造出什么奇观异景吗？将你的建筑截图(和其他有用的信息)发送到 FeatureMe@minecraft.net 并留意今后的文章吧！
